channel.title: Texas Road Trip on Haojin's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Texas Road Trip on Haojin's Blog

item.title: Fredericksburg
item.description: A beautiful German town with a heroic history that has my highest respect.

item.title: San Antonio
item.description: A slow-paced city that I stayed for Christmas and last stop before Big Bend adventure.

item.title: Austin
item.description: I find myself falling more in love with Texas each time I discover a new city.

item.title: Drive to Austin
item.description: It’s quite a long drive from Dallas to Austin, but there’s also quite a lot to see on the way.

item.title: Fort Worth
item.description: Worth visiting city near Dallas with a lot of niche attractions.

item.title: Dallas
item.description: Grand Texas road trip thus begins…
